Welcome to Ubik's wiki.

= News =

* 2008-12-11: Added Guice support

= Guice and Ubik =

We have implemented some cool use features in order to adapt Ubik to Guice: 

* the ability to export (to a Ubik JNDI server) objects instantiated by Guice as Ubik services.
* the ability to inject as dependencies remote references looked up into a Ubik JNDI server.
